attributes.action: address the quality of nurse handovers by using standard format handover documentation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every ward has a different way of passing on info between shifts - and the quality of "handovers" is atrocious. Please commission the design of a standard format sheet instead of scraps of paper. Some units at present each develop their own, which leads to inconsistency. In my professional experience, the standard of care received by the patient is affected by poor communication particularly in respect of :

1. Diagnosis - especially in terms of common ailments
 
2. Whether the patient actually knows ! 

3. PMH

4. Breaches of confidentiality
